programme.title: Top Tip PT3 (Matematik)
programme.desc: Tips Tutor Tv Top adalah kapsul yang memaparkan guru terpilih yang akan mengajar beberapa cara belajar dan bagaimana untuk menjawab dengan betul dalam peperiksaan.

programme.title: SMK Study Squad Ep02
programme.desc: Geng SMK: Study Squad belajar tentang penghasilan sampah di Malaysia dan cuba amalkan kitar semula. Tiba-tiba, air terputus pula! Sekarang, mereka hendaklah belajar cara-cara untuk jimat air.

programme.title: TVP@TTV Sains Ting. 3 Ep05
programme.desc: Tajuk ini menerangkan mengenai sinaran mengion dan sinaran tidak mengion serta kegunaan radioaktif dalam kehidupan.

programme.title: TVP@TTV Hifz Al-quran Ting. 3 Ep01
programme.desc: Topik ini menerangkan tentang mad tamkin. Penyampai menerangkan ta'rif mad tamkin, sebab dinamakan mad tamkin, hukum mad tamkin di sisi Imam Hafs dan kadar bacaan mad tamkin.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Melayu Ep10
programme.desc: Menganalisis Ujian Bertulis Kertas 2, Bahagian A iaitu Penulisan Soalan Karangan Respons Terhad atau karangan pendek serta cara mendapat skor cemerlang dan kriteria penskoran yang akan digunakan.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep10
programme.desc: We will be learning how to answer a Speaking Test and focus on the Part 3 question, which is a discussion task done in pairs. Learn some useful skills on how to do well in a Speaking Test.

programme.desc: Membincangkan cara menggunakan garis nombor untuk penambahan integer positif dan penambahan integer negatif. Turut disertakan soalan Pengendalian Data dan cara menyelesaikan Rumus Algebra.

programme.desc: Kembali dengan musim terbaru, saksikan Alif Farhan & Ain Edruce bersama tetamu jemputan mereka yang pasti kecoh sambil merungkai video-video pelik yang 'trending' pada minggu ini.

programme.title: Travel Lawak Ep09
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Motif Sosial? Ep12
programme.desc: Kesinambungan Motif Viral, kali ini melalui eksperimen sosial yang viral dengan penampilan selebriti undangan.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline Ep12
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangn bual bicara santai bersama Dato' Hans Isaac dan tetamu undanggannya yang terdiri daripada pelawak popular tanah air.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak Series Ep13
programme.desc: Tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.Saksilan lakonan mantap Lisa Surihani , dan kumpulan senario

programme.title: Spontan Boboi & Kengkawan (HD) Ep01
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan Spontan kanak-kanak yang di hoskan oleh Afdlin Shauki bersama artist and pelawak jemputan

programme.title: Muzikal Lawak Superstar Terbaik Ep04
programme.desc: Istimewa buat penonton setia Astro Warna, kami bawakan kompilasi persembahan terbaik daripada finalis Muzikal Lawak Superstar.

programme.title: Ini Malam Kita Punya Ep07
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang akan dihoskan oleh Nabil Ahmad yang akan mengetengahkan sketch lawak dan temu bual bersama artis-artis terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Gema Lawak Superstar Episod Akhir Ep04
programme.desc: Tiga minggu telah berlangsung, kini tiba minggu terakhir di mana peserta diberikan tugasan bertemakan 'Nostalgia'. Kumpulan manakah yang bakal dinobatkan sebagai juara mingguan?

programme.title: Chapalrela Ep05
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Anjang Merah yang sering dibuli oleh saudara dan mak tirinya lakonan mantap Zizan, Johan dan Sherry Ibrahim.

programme.title: Saka Sisters Ep09
programme.desc: Ketika Taqriz hampir sesak nafas, Laila muncul dan potong akar itu dengan pisau. Mereka lekas-lekas larikan diri menjauhi kawasan Jembalang Tanah itu.

programme.title: Saka Sisters Ep10
programme.desc: Sekumpulan model menginap sebuah rumah 'homestay' kampung untuk sesi 'photoshot'. Anita, model cantik telah terserempak dengan wanita hodoh yang asyik sebut 'kum-kum'.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Al Puasa 2021 Ep01
programme.desc: Rezki, anak hasil penceraian yang tinggal bersama bapa dan datuknya di kampung dengan hidup yang serba sederhana. Hidupnya mula berubah apabila ibunya membawa dia tinggal di bandar dan dilimpahi kemewahan.

programme.title: Joras & Stars Ep02
programme.desc: Joras & Stars ialah sketsa yang menampilkan Naib Juara MLM 2016 bersama artis jemputan setiap minggu untuk menghiburkan penonton melalui sketsa yang kelakar. Lakonan Joey, Syuk dan Rahim.

programme.title: J-POP Ep07
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Jiggy Masin, saksikan sebuah 'game show' baru yang turut boleh disertai oleh penonton dan menangi hadiah menarik pada setiap minggu.

programme.title: Kuali Terbalik Ep13
programme.desc: Sebuah program baru yang menggabungkan elemen drama, komedi dan program masakan dalam satu rancangan. Setiap episod akan menampilakan spoof daripada drama terbaik Astro dan juga filem box office.

programme.title: Kata Jihan Ep05
programme.desc: Jihan Muse kini kembali! Jom bergelak tawa sambil berbicara tentang topik menarik bersama Jihan, dan tetamu undangannya.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik musim baru yang dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal menjemput artis menaiki kereta 'Vintage' dan berbual menceritakan tentang kisah hidup seseorang artis seperti Johan, Zizan & Nabila Huda.

programme.title: ChiaChiaChia Sepahtu Reunion Live 2021 Ep05
programme.desc: Saksikan Jep, Rahim & Pak Ya dalam musim terbaru Sepahtu Reunion Live bersama selebriti undangan setiap hari Khamis, jam 9.00 malam hanya di Astro Warna saluran 107.

programme.title: Layan Je! Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep04

programme.title: 3 Minit Punchline DAC S2 Ep34

programme.title: All Stars Buka Panggung Ep06
programme.desc: Saksikan 20 pelakon popular yang dicabar untuk melakukan komedi improv di pentas All Stars Buka Panggung. Dihoskan oleh Ajak & Shahrol, siapakah yang menjadi juara mingguan dan melayakkan diri ke final?

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: As Wong Hei, a slick assassin, zeroes in on a millionaire named Shek, little does he expect to find himself the target of someone even more dangerous.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: When the Emperor employs Manchu boxers to eradicate the Shao Lin martial artists, see how two escapees begin a quest to restore the reputation of Shao Lin.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: King Hu's groundbreaking film set the foundation for all his action films that followed, most notably Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Various people are out to get the Shadow Whip (an individual, not just a weapon). Starring Cheng Pei Pei and Yueh Hua.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents this ultimate depiction of dysfunctional kung fu masters, overcoming their shortcomings to win the day, one corpse at a time.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: If you liked House of 72 Tenants, you won't want to miss out on this humorous, fun-filled sequel complete with 10 more tenants!

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A trio of heroes go up against a power-hungry Ming Dynasty official and also cross paths with three beauties.

programme.title: Mr. Funny Bone
programme.desc: Whenever Mr. Funny Bone travels about with his sidekick Big Potato, he often gets involved in all manner of charming comic mishaps.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: Shu Pei-pei shines in this production alongside hero Yueh Hua, her stalwart companion, in a battle to rid their town of killers and thieves.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: A follow-up to the previous blockbuster, this 60's musical features an unemployed magician whose love life is as twisted as his tricks.

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: The retired one-armed swordsman made his reappearance to fight against the brutal robbers and protect the peace of the martial art world.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A motorcycle workshop owner feels compelled to damn the physical and legal consequences and go on racing.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: Guaranteed to sweep the audience off their feet, this battle between a usurper of the throne and patriots led by Wu Wen-yuan climaxes in an eventful ending!

programme.title: Disciples of Shaolin
programme.desc: One of Chang Cheh's finest films, this saga stars Alexander Fu Sheng in his greatest martial arts role as a penniless country boy who fights his way to riches.

programme.title: Killers on Wheels
programme.desc: While taking a ferry on the way to a vacation, Kwok and his family meet a road thug who puts an ugly spin on their holiday plans.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Featuring the unforgettable song Country Road, Shaw's Huangmei Opera stars Ivy Ling Po and tells the tale of a poor student engaged to a billionaire's daughter.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Set in Seoul right after the Korean War, a kung-fu master, combat instructor, explosives expert and missiles specialist take on a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: Lady of Steel
programme.desc: Kung fu queen Cheng Pei-pei plays a swordswoman on a mission to find the bandits who killed her parents and save her country from foreign invaders.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: Regular Joes turn heroes to save their neighbourhood, when a local mobster decides to turn their local gossip spot into a gambling den!

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: 5 Shaolin rebels train hard in order to successfully defeat their Manchu enemies. Starring David Chiang, Ti Lung, Alexander Fu.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin loyalists (led by Alexander Fu Sheng and Chen Kuan Tai) go up against a formidable Manchu general and his Tibetan allies.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu Lan
programme.desc: A young woman joins the army in place of her old, ailing father and only when she returns home is the truth revealed.

programme.title: A Taste of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword, as the Five Tigers take this adventure to the outer limits.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin hero and the vicious Pai Mei lock horns in this kungfu revenge tale that spans two generations.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: In Wong Jing's first modern drama spiced up by three great kung fu choreographers, stars Ti Lung, Chen Hui Min, Wang Lung Wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu defy death.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh teams up with the Five Venoms in this martial arts saga that captures the fab five at their swashbuckling best.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: The murder of a high profile Japanese businessman results in a 100 million bounty on the killer's head. Yet, when one of his own begins a hunt, the outcome proves surprising.

programme.title: So, I Married My Anti-fan
programme.desc: Starring Korean boy band EXO member Chanyeol & Chinese actress Yuan Shan Shan, this drama depicts how an anti-fan falls for the idol she initially hated.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five university students find themselves braving the supernatural & a murky past at a school once used by the Japanese to conduct macabre human experiments.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent & three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: In this 39th Hong Kong Film Award winner, a newly-engaged woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander. Will she be able to free herself from her past?

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Superstar Andy Lau stars as a bomb specialist set on capturing a wanted criminal called Blast in this action-drama. However, will he be able to do it in time when Blast threatens a massacre?

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom-To-Be
programme.desc: Carmen, who works at a PR company, has no intention of having children and is enjoying married life. Yet, what happens when she suddenly finds herself pregnant?

programme.title: Hungry Ghost Ritual
programme.desc: In this dark tale, Nick Cheung plays the son of an opera troupe owner, who finds his cast behaving strangely and the most terrifying show ever about to begin.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: Winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards. After his beloved married his brother, Yang Feng leaves to run an isolated inn and becomes a broker for assassins.

programme.title: Viral MH000991
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, this chilling Thai tale depicts how a gamer captures a spirit photo that she shares with friends - only to release the spirit that begins to haunt them all.

programme.title: Let Me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: When a geeky teen librarian stumbles upon the secret terminal illness of his popular classmate, he slowly begins to help her achieve her bucket list. Simultaneously, she draws him out of his shell.

programme.title: Legend of Mysterious Agent
programme.desc: Female students in Baicheng are missing and killed by vampires. Exorcism trio tries to hunt them down. A Millennium vampire disguises as the warlord, only to collect the blood of missing girls.

programme.title: Three
programme.desc: Directed by Johnnie To, this action-thriller depicts how a doctor, a cop & a corned thug trigger a vicious cycle fueled by bad decisions & conflicting desires.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: While covering a smuggling case in London, TV host Ha Mui meets a thief and a washed-out detective. They have different goals but must work together to retrieve the missing artefact.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Perfect Imperfection
programme.desc: Starring Ady An, Ahn Jae Hyun & Alex Fong, this drama depicts the varying perspectives of love that drive two people born under the same horoscope sign - Virgo.

programme.title: OlaBola
programme.desc: The producers of The Journey present a heartwarming tale of friendship, sporting spirit & national unity, embodied in a multicultural football team of the '80s.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: When service at the 5-star Bai Xing Hotel is not living up to its billing, tough executive Cruella Koo is sent to whip the employees into shape and inject a little glamour into the hotel.

programme.title: Phantom of the Theatre
programme.desc: Ruby Lin shines in this dark tale set in a haunted theatre, a once-grand playhouse that re-opens with a new show which awakens a forgotten tragedy.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: While using a new invention, three friends wind up trapped in the 1993 film Flirting Scholar. Upon discovering that the lead character, Tang Pak Fu, is missing, the trio devises a plan.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: On a first date, a black man and woman are stopped by a policeman over a minor traffic infraction. As the situation spirals, the man kills the officer in self-defense, forcing the two to go on the run.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A veteran investigating the bizarre murder of a fellow officer discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. She suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: High school students conspire to steal the answers to the SAT but realize that true happiness does not stem from a perfect score.

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, 'All My Life' follows a young couple (Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.) who are planning their wedding even after the groom's devastating cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Wonder Woman: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Wonder Woman fights to free a troubled young girl enlisted by the deadly organization Villainy Inc., whose criminal members have their sights set on invading Themyscira; Wonder Woman's paradise home.

programme.title: Just Go With it
programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: An elite U.S. Special Forces unit, sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission, is betrayed and left for dead.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Harrison Ford is adventurer Indiana Jones and he's out to find a powerful relic before the Nazis do!

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: When four outsiders saw the collapse of the economy, they had an idea that leads them into the dark underbelly of modern banking questioning everyone and everything.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep04
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: 40 years after the terrifying events at Overlook Hotel, Dan Torrance found some semblance of peace which is quickly shattered when he met a courageous teenager with a powerful extrasensory gift.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: A young countryside woman and an affluent banker paralyzed in a tragic accident couldn't have less in common, but in this heartbreakingly romance, they gain understanding, and ultimately love.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: One family is put to the test during a 12-hour period where crime is made legal and emergency services are suspended.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: An all-star athlete and accomplished debater, Luce's reputation is questioned when his teacher makes a discovery in his locker. But is he at fault, or is his teacher preying on dangerous stereotypes?

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep413
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep414
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep516
programme.desc: It's Halloween in Adventure Bay, but a mysterious kid in a giant spider costume takes all the treats from Trick-Or-Treaters! // Alex and his Mini-Patrol accidentally take off on Daring Danny's rocket bike!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep521
programme.desc: Jake's family cuckoo clock is sliding down the mountain with Chickaletta stuck in it! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When the Robotons dump a load of plastic in the Crystal Lake, a raging lake monster appears and Rammy has to conquer his fear of water to save the day!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Calvin's remote control car has been turbo charged and is out of control! Can Calvin summon his PLAY POWER before the kid cave is totally destroyed?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep112
programme.desc: ROBO G's robot flock are loose on the dangerous Rock Block Mountain! Calvin launches a Robo Rescue Mission but they keep escaping! Calvin uses his PLAY POWER and calls on a special helper to save them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington invites Mr Curry to stay with the Browns whilst his house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington wins a raffle and his prize is a meal for two at Sofia's caf, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council condemns it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Today is George's birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep222
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppa's playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the 'tug of war'. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it's not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Peppa's car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog's garage isn't far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa's car back to his garage.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Windy Pete is sailing around the world, blasting tropical climates with snow! Will the Ocean Patrol stop his snowy assault?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out it's ending- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? We also help Rapunzel out.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep219
programme.desc: We've set up a pretend beach in the backyard and play a game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to see. We'll learn what items sink and float, and about camouflage with our ocean friends' help.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep601
programme.desc: When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even he may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep108
programme.desc: After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep104
programme.desc: After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep325
programme.desc: Daring Danny's at it again, luckily the Pups could raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep148
programme.desc: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep118
programme.desc: It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. We learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep101
programme.desc: When Cap'n Turbot's boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumi's fruit before an early snowstorm comes!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep112
programme.desc: We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must rescue him and bring him back to shore.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep204
programme.desc: It's Mrs. Bird Day and Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep411
programme.desc: When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep412
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, it's up to Blaze to get it back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S4 Ep407
programme.desc: Bubble Puppy disappears after he bites down on ancient magic bone, so the Guppies must embark on an epic booby-trapped adventure to find their lost puppy!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Gil wants to be a ninja! But his ninja teacher just keeps giving him random tasks to do. Gil is about to give up when another ninja challenges him and he realizes he's been learning ninja skills all along!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is drawing shapes, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Peppa's playgroup holds a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof. Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. They all bring an old toy but soon realise that it is hard to let them go.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Count along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy. We help Shovel and Pail learn who has more graham crackers and help Josh see what he can buy with Blue dollars.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! It's up to them to find the sunstone to save Roarian!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep417
programme.desc: A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep524
programme.desc: Yumi's Robo-Corn Plucker goes haywire. Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a 'Bird X' mascot, gets carried away by eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 Ep526
programme.desc: Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday! // Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep107
programme.desc: A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep113
programme.desc: All of Calvin's slime has gone off! ROBO G helps him create a fresh batch with a Super Slime Machine! But when the machine goes crazy, Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to save the day.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep114
programme.desc: A sudden power failure leaves ROBO G critically low on battery and the kid cave in virtual darkness. It's up to Calvin to use his PLAY POWER to fix the Mega Power Maker and get ROBO G fully charged up!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep125
programme.desc: It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat from Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a metal detector. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington says he will watch the cafe so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a school raffle: a hot air balloon trip. Peppa and her family climb aboard, enjoying the trip until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, they land in a familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles even in the rain, but George takes off his rain hat and catches a cold. He feels better after awhile. Now he is happy to wear his hat, even when it isn't raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need them too so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is disappointed that she has perfect vision but she can still wear fabulous sunglasses!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep227
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa cuts the grass in no time with his awesome lawnmower. Peppa and George find the ball and it bounces brilliantly on short grass!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.desc: Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep102
programme.desc: It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants. As we look for clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns and take a trip to Joe's Present Store

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep142
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa likes the swings but George doesn't because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide as it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.desc: Saksikan KEMBARA SI MANJA yang menampilkan pasukan-pasukan yang terdiri daripada seorang anak bersama ibu atau bapa mereka mengharungi cabaran yang menguji ketahanan fizikal dan mental masing-masing.

programme.desc: Nini (Mia Sara) dan Haikal (Rykarl) iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Cuak! Ep08
